content: sandwich headband knitting pattern by sofia magdalena sizes s m l gauge 23 sts x 31 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 in needles 3 5 mm us4 40 cm circular needles or dpns yarn mc 50 100 100 g dk weight yarn cc1 10 20 20 g dk weight yarn cc2 10 10 10 g dk weight yarn about this pattern this is a reversible headband which is made extra warm by the double layered colorwork floats inside size guide choose the size which has a finished circumference closest to your head circumference if you are between sizes choose the smaller size size finished circumference s 45 cm 17 75 in m 52 cm 20 5 in l 59 cm 23 25 in techniques long-tail cast-on stockinette stitch in the round k every stitch on every row picking up stitches bind off i-cord bind off abbreviations st s stitch es mc main color cc contrast color rs right side of fabric panel 1 cast on 105 120 135 sts using the long-tail cast-on knit stockinette for 9 row begin following the flower pattern in the colorwork chart for 13 row using cc1 hold cc1 dominant you should have 7 8 9 flower repeats knit stockinette for 9 row bind off panel 2 cast on 105 120 135 sts using the long-tail cast-on knit stockinette for 3 row begin following the dot pattern in the colorwork chart for 25 row using cc2 hold cc2 dominant you should have 7 8 9 repeats of this chart on the band knit stockinette for 3 row bind off i-cord edge pick up 3 sts for every 4 sts along one edge of the headband pulling sts through both panels held together with rs facing out bind off with a 3 st i-cord repeat this process for the other edge of the headband taking care to pick sts up from the same panel as previously as the front and back of the picked up i-cord will look a bit different thank you for knitting if you have any further questions feel free to contact me at sohvi magdalena@gmail com or through instagram @s ohvi please share progress pictures and finished objects on instagram with #sandwichheadband or on the sandwich headband ravelry page
